about_the_game:
In this demo, you’ll get a taste of the full game.

Chat with four (five in the final version) sexy girls, carefully choosing your responses as you engage in a series of exciting conversations. Discover their personalities, learn their kinks, and uncover their deepest, most forbidden desires.

Flirting isn’t just about dialogue—take them on dates or surprise them with a fun word slicer minigame.

In the demo, you can play through the first chapter of all four characters. At the end of each chapter, you’ll unlock a special 3D scene that offers a closer look at the characters, both in story and... other ways.

The Girls

Komori, the Punk Vampire Girl

A lead singer to an underground punk band, Komori is a real daredevil, all about creating some real excitement, more than most would prefer. The catch? Rumors are, that she may or may not be an actual vampire, her favorite beverage being the living blood of her fans. If it is true, it's not really kept a secret, as her band is filled with bat and vampiristic motives.

Sora, the Soaring Angel Girl

A girl with an innocent face, Sora is quite the submissive type. She wants nothing more than a strong, dominant guy she can rely on and cuddle up with on cold nights. As for the hot summer nights, her loose clothes barely hang onto her, and as she soars in the skies, she enjoys being free from all bounds in more ways than one. This carefreeness can often come at a cost however.

Jochu, the Diligent Hardworker

Nothing pleases her more than doing her best, pushing herself to the limits for those she loves. A jack of all trades, master of none, but a master of hardwork, Jochu has been through many, entirely different vocations. Not finding her calling in any of them, she has realized that it was always the people she enjoyed that surrounded her. A true people pleaser, that surely would not mind satisfying her man in any way he desires.

Ryoko the Gym Muscle Girl

The strongest of the girls, Ryoko is a true tomboy, spending most of her time working on her physique in the gym, and winning female natural bodybuilding competitions as her passion. She is a true lifter, and will at least prove a mighty fine competition for control, for any that would end up with her in bed.

content_descriptors.notes:
The whole game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the icons and user interface
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. In the dialogues the sexuality also there in a mid level.

No violence and drug in the game.

name: 5 Girls, 1 Honey Demo
short_description: Chat with four sexy girls, carefully choosing your responses as you engage in a series of exciting conversations in this Visual Novel like game. Discover their personalities, learn their kinks, and uncover their deepest, most forbidden desires.
